name: Claustrophobia (Sir_Obvious)
description:
Claustrophobia is a wave-based top down shooter game about facing your fears… with Violence!

Keep slaying your demons to stop the walls from closing in on you. The enemies become stronger in each wave, so don't forget to buy upgrades in the shop between waves!

Controls: WASD to move, mouse to aim and fire

Created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 37 game jam, with the theme "One Room". You can rate it here if you entered the jam.

Programming: @Obvious_San

Art: Kevin Houlihan (@randomhuman)

Music/SFX: Jeremy Hunter
